```py
>>> np.fromfunction(lambda i, j: i, (2, 2), dtype=float)
array([[0., 0.],
 [1., 1.]]) 
```

```py
>>> np.fromfunction(lambda i, j: j, (2, 2), dtype=float)
array([[0., 1.],
 [0., 1.]]) 
```

```py
>>> np.fromfunction(lambda i, j: i == j, (3, 3), dtype=int)
array([[ True, False, False],
 [False,  True, False],
 [False, False,  True]]) 
```

```py
>>> np.fromfunction(lambda i, j: i + j, (3, 3), dtype=int)
array([[0, 1, 2],
 [1, 2, 3],
 [2, 3, 4]]) 
```
